casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Zachary John ROSE 367P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2017

Mr. Douglas E. Kingsbery, Attorney at Law, For Rose, Zachary John.

Ms. Melissa Hill, Attorney at Law, For State.

Mr. John F. Oates, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, For State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of November 2017."
